title: T205 SGC Poor to Excellent condition, including a MULTI STRIKE
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: T205 SGC Poor to Excellent condition, including a MULTI STRIKE
posts.post_content:
My wife and I have found ourselves in a financial bind due to unexpected medical bills.  I am selling off a huge chunk of my t205 collection (I had a small one to start with).
All prices are negotiable so don't be afraid to ask.

[S]Kirb White, Polar Bear, SGC 10 (1) - $30[/S] SOLD
[S]Edward Reulbach, Hassan 649, SGC 35 (2.5) (I think this would equated to a 5mc) - $35[/S] SOLD
[S]Arnold Hauser, Piedmont 25, SGC 55 (4.5) - $55[/S] SOLD
[S]Charles Dooin, Piedmont 25, SGC 55 (4.5) - $55[/S] SOLD
[S]Frank Schulte, Piedmont 25, SGC 60 (5) - $80[/S]SOLD
[S]Fred Snodgrass, Piedmont 25, SGC 40 (3) - $30[/S] SOLD
[S]J. Owen Wilson, Piedmont 42, SGC 35 (2.5) - $40[/S] SOLD
[S]John Flynn, Piedmont 25, SGC 60 (5) (Hard card for grade, top two t205 SGC registries have lower than 5) - $90[/S]SOLD
[S]Chief Meyers, Hassan 649, SGC 60 (5)- $90[/S] SOLD
[S]Charles O'Leary, Piedmont 25, SGC 40 (3) - $30[/S] SOLD

[S]These 4 cards are being sold as a lot for $30.
James Vaughn, Edward Grant, Jake Stahl, Arthur Fromme.[/S] SOLD
PMs and emails have been responded to.  Thanks for the interest so far.
List updated to show what is pending/sold.  Also lowered some prices on a the SGC 60s.

Paid for cards are packaged up and ready for the mail tomorrow.

There are just a handful left, but they are good ones.  Let me know what you need.
